name: Charlie's Dress UP!
description:
i was curious whether I'd be able to make a point n click dressup game on rpgmaker mv (Turns out i very much was)

Everythings made by me this time yes even the music...Thank you rpgmaker and my friend kathinka again for being an inspiration (Seriously When isnt she???) (She made a dressup game on rpgmv too i think u should check it out as well)

Yay
